title: Navigation Bar
reference-overview:
The Navigation Bar is denoted by the gray background area. If it is used, it will always be displayed immediately underneath the Masthead. There are two primary versions:

  • Tabs
  • Sliding Menu

In addition, there are other optional pieces that can be used, including Text Links, Secondary Icons, User Identifier.
reference-usage: The Navigation Bar should be used in conjunction with the Masthead to create the overall Product Header. The Tabs version should be used when you want to explicitly convey the main site structure in the main navigation. The Sliding Menu version should be used when you want the main navigation accessible on each screen but not necessarily front and center on the sceen.
